name: Fallout

input_menu.description: Choose the desired language (russian language will be unavailable if you select english language):

task.description: Installing the FUP mod, select game folder as install folder
task.name: wineexec

task.description:
Configuring the Hi-res patch.
 Make sure you enable it before clicking Done
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- fup: 'N/A: Select file downloaded from https://www.mediafire.com/file/o7hm7dj8x2epoz0/Fallout_Update_Pack_%5B2.1.0%5D.exe/file'
game:
  appid: 38400
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- input_menu:
    description: 'Choose the desired language (russian language will be unavailable
      if you select english language):'
    id: LANG
    options:
    - en_US.UTF-8: English
    - ru_RU.UTF-8: Russian + English
    preselect: English
- task:
    description: Installing the FUP mod, select game folder as install folder
    env:
      LC_ALL: $LANG
    executable: fup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    working_dir: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: "Configuring the Hi-res patch.\n Make sure you enable it before clicking\
      \ Done"
    executable: f1_res_Config.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    working_dir: $GAMEDIR
winesteam:
  overrides:
    ddraw.dll: native
